SELECT * FROM PROJECT where 1=1
and title like '%'||#{title}||'%'
and dept like '%'||#{dept}||'%'
SELECT p.*, AVG(progress) progAvg FROM PROJECT p, PRJPARTICIPANT pp, SCHEDULE s WHERE p.PNO = pp.PNO AND p.PNO = s.PNO AND pp.USERNO = #{userno} GROUP BY p.PNO, p.TITLE, p.DEPT, p.PMNO
SELECT p.TITLE, p.DEPT, p.PMNO, s.* FROM PROJECT p, SCHEDULE s WHERE p.PNO = s.PNO AND p.PMNO = #{pmno}
SELECT max(pno) FROM PROJECT WHERE PMNO = #{pmno}
SELECT p.USERNO, pj.TITLE, pj.DEPT, s.* FROM SCHEDULE s, PROJECT pj, SCHPARTICIPANT p WHERE pj.PNO = s.PNO AND pj.PNO = p.PNO AND s.SNO = p.SNO AND p.USERNO = #{userno} ORDER BY s.SNO
SELECT * FROM SCHEDULE WHERE pno = #{pno} ORDER BY s.SNO
